title: Cardi B., Carmelo Anthony, Sheryl Underwood, Miss Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Cardi B., Carmelo Anthony, Sheryl Underwood, Miss Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Welcome to the ride everybody!  Show opens today with a success story from Steve.  Last night and tonight, all eyes are on Miami for the Democratic Debate.  Cardi B. drops her new video Press.  Eric Trump was spat on in Chicago.  Carmelo Anthony is suspected of cheating of Lala and issues a statement.  A cheating husband in England had his soccer set valued at $56k for a whopping $6 by his vengeful wife.  Sheryl Underwood stops by gives us her dates and opinion about the Democratic Debate.  Miss Carla is back with Reality Update talking about Real Housewives of Potomac and more.  Kevin Durant will be missing the next season due to his Achilles tendon injury.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about dreams turning into goals and so much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
